One of the aims of Chrysler Group's integration efforts will be to meet driver expectations for smooth and quiet operation, so that Americans will want to buy and will enjoy driving vehicles with this technology. The EPA's technology, developed at its lab in Ann Arbor, Michigan, is starting to appear in delivery and garbage trucks.
